languages.text: {n}Эмелина вздыхает.{/n} "Я знаю, дознаватель ван Калокс. Знаю все процедуры, связанные со скомпрометированными савантами. Дознание, вскрытие реминисцентных блоков... Но прежде чем мы начнем..." {n}Она поднимается на ноги, насколько может выпрямляет изогнутую спину и смотрит в глаза дознавателю со слабой улыбкой.{/n} "Я думала, что Танакия — твоя работа. Теперь, когда твоя реакция открыла мне истину..."

{n}Emelina sighs.{/n} "I know, Interrogator van Calox. I know all the procedures used on compromised Sages: interrogation, unsealing of reminiscence blocks... But before we begin..." {n}She stands up, straightening her spine as much as she can, and looks into the Interrogator's eyes with a weak smile.{/n} "I thought Tanakia was your doing. But as your reaction has revealed the truth to me..."
languages.original_text: {n}Эмелина вздыхает.{/n} "Я знаю, дознаватель ван Калокс. Знаю все процедуры, связанные со скомпрометированными савантами. Дознание, вскрытие реминисцентных блоков... Но прежде чем мы начнем..." {n}Она поднимается на ноги, насколько может выпрямляет изогнутую спину и смотрит в глаза дознавателю со слабой улыбкой.{/n} "Я думала, что Танакия — твоя работа. Теперь, когда твоя реакция открыла мне истину..."

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜叹了口气。{/n}“我明白的，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官，我明白审判庭都是怎么对付贤者的。审讯……解锁记忆区块……不过，在你审讯之前……”{n}她站起身来，尽可能地挺直了脊梁，脸上挂着虚弱的微笑，直视着审讯官的双眼。{/n}“我本以为是你杀害了塔娜基娅，但你的反应让我看到了真相……”
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina sighs.{/n} "I know, Interrogator van Calox. I know all the procedures used on compromised Sages: interrogation, unsealing of reminiscence blocks... But before we begin..." {n}She stands up, straightening her spine as much as she can, and looks into the Interrogator's eyes with a weak smile.{/n} "I thought Tanakia was your doing. But as your reaction has revealed the truth to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜叹了口气。{/n}“我明白的，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官，我明白审判庭都是怎么对付贤者的。审讯……解锁记忆区块……不过，在你审讯之前……”{n}她站起身来，尽可能地挺直了脊梁，脸上挂着虚弱的微笑，直视着审讯官的双眼。{/n}“我本以为是你杀害了塔娜基娅，但你的反应让我看到了真相……”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina suspira.{/n} «Lo sé, interrogador van Calox. Conozco todos los procedimientos que se usan contra los sabios corruptos: interrogación, apertura de bloques reminiscentes... Pero antes de que empecemos...». {n}Se levanta, estirándose tanto como puede, y mira al interrogador a los ojos con una sonrisa débil.{/n} «Pensé que Tanakia había sido cosa suya. Pero ahora que su reacción me ha mostrado la verdad...».
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina sighs.{/n} "I know, Interrogator van Calox. I know all the procedures used on compromised Sages: interrogation, unsealing of reminiscence blocks... But before we begin..." {n}She stands up, straightening her spine as much as she can, and looks into the Interrogator's eyes with a weak smile.{/n} "I thought Tanakia was your doing. But as your reaction has revealed the truth to me..."

Conozco todos los procedimientos que se usan contra los sabios corruptos: interrogación, apertura de bloques reminiscentes... Pero antes de que empecemos...». {n}Se levanta, estirándose tanto como puede, y mira al interrogador a los ojos con una sonrisa débil.{/n} «Pensé que Tanakia había sido cosa suya. Pero ahora que su reacción me ha mostrado la verdad...».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}エメリナはため息をつく。{/n}「わかっています、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス。堕ちた賢者たちに使われたすべての手順を知っています。尋問も、回想ブロックの封印解除も…でも、始める前に…」{n}彼女は立ち上がるとできる限り背筋を伸ばし、弱々しい笑みを浮かべながらインテロゲイターの目を覗き込んだ。{/n}「タナキアは、あなたの仕業だと思っていました。しかし、あなたの反応で真実が明らかになりました…」
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina sighs.{/n} "I know, Interrogator van Calox. I know all the procedures used on compromised Sages: interrogation, unsealing of reminiscence blocks... But before we begin..." {n}She stands up, straightening her spine as much as she can, and looks into the Interrogator's eyes with a weak smile.{/n} "I thought Tanakia was your doing. But as your reaction has revealed the truth to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナはため息をつく。{/n}「わかっています、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス。堕ちた賢者たちに使われたすべての手順を知っています。尋問も、回想ブロックの封印解除も…でも、始める前に…」{n}彼女は立ち上がるとできる限り背筋を伸ばし、弱々しい笑みを浮かべながらインテロゲイターの目を覗き込んだ。{/n}「タナキアは、あなたの仕業だと思っていました。しかし、あなたの反応で真実が明らかになりました…」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina soupire.{/n} « Je sais, interrogateur van Calox. Je connais toutes les procédures utilisées sur les sages compromis : interrogatoire, descellement des blocs mémoriels... Mais avant que nous ne commencions... » {n}Elle se lève, en essayant de se tenir aussi droite que possible, et regarde l'interrogateur droit dans les yeux avec un demi-sourire.{/n} « Je croyais que vous étiez responsable pour Tanakia, mais votre réaction m'a révélé la vérité... »
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina sighs.{/n} "I know, Interrogator van Calox. I know all the procedures used on compromised Sages: interrogation, unsealing of reminiscence blocks... But before we begin..." {n}She stands up, straightening her spine as much as she can, and looks into the Interrogator's eyes with a weak smile.{/n} "I thought Tanakia was your doing. But as your reaction has revealed the truth to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina soupire.{/n} « Je sais, interrogateur van Calox. Je connais toutes les procédures utilisées sur les sages compromis : interrogatoire, descellement des blocs mémoriels... Mais avant que nous ne commencions... » {n}Elle se lève, en essayant de se tenir aussi droite que possible, et regarde l'interrogateur droit dans les yeux avec un demi-sourire.{/n} « Je croyais que vous étiez responsable pour Tanakia, mais votre réaction m'a révélé la vérité... »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina seufzt.{/n} "Ich weiß, Interrogator van Calox. Ich kenne alle Prozeduren für kompromittierte Weise: Verhör, Öffnen von Erinnerungsblöcken ... Aber bevor wir anfangen ..." {n}Sie steht auf, so aufrecht ihre Wirbelsäule es zulässt, und sieht dem Interrogator mit einem schwachen Lächeln in die Augen.{/n} "Ich dachte, Tanakia wäre Euer Werk. Aber als Eure Reaktion mir die Wahrheit offenbart hat ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina sighs.{/n} "I know, Interrogator van Calox. I know all the procedures used on compromised Sages: interrogation, unsealing of reminiscence blocks... But before we begin..." {n}She stands up, straightening her spine as much as she can, and looks into the Interrogator's eyes with a weak smile.{/n} "I thought Tanakia was your doing. But as your reaction has revealed the truth to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina seufzt.{/n} "Ich weiß, Interrogator van Calox. Ich kenne alle Prozeduren für kompromittierte Weise: Verhör, Öffnen von Erinnerungsblöcken ... Aber bevor wir anfangen ..." {n}Sie steht auf, so aufrecht ihre Wirbelsäule es zulässt, und sieht dem Interrogator mit einem schwachen Lächeln in die Augen.{/n} "Ich dachte, Tanakia wäre Euer Werk. Aber als Eure Reaktion mir die Wahrheit offenbart hat ..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina iç çekiyor.{/n} "Biliyorum Sorgucu van Calox. Tehlikeli addedilen Âlimlere karşı uygulanan tüm prosedürleri biliyorum: Sorgu, anı bloklarının açılması... Ama başlamadan önce..." {n}Ayağa kalkıyor, omurgasını olabildiğince dikleştiriyor ve zayıf bir gülümsemeyle Sorgucu'nun gözlerine bakıyor.{/n} "Tanakia ile senin ilgilendiğini düşünmüştüm fakat tepkin, gerçeği anlamamı sağladı."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina sighs.{/n} "I know, Interrogator van Calox. I know all the procedures used on compromised Sages: interrogation, unsealing of reminiscence blocks... But before we begin..." {n}She stands up, straightening her spine as much as she can, and looks into the Interrogator's eyes with a weak smile.{/n} "I thought Tanakia was your doing. But as your reaction has revealed the truth to me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina iç çekiyor.{/n} "Biliyorum Sorgucu van Calox. Tehlikeli addedilen Âlimler üzerinde uygulanan tüm prosedürleri biliyorum: Sorgu, anı bloklarının açılması... Ama başlamadan önce..." {n}Ayağa kalkıyor, omurgasını olabildiğince dikleştiriyor ve zayıf bir gülümsemeyle Sorgucu'nun gözlerine bakıyor.{/n} "Tanakia ile senin ilgilendiğini düşünmüştüm ama tepkin gerçeği anlamamı sağladı."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
